Get to know me


Hey, I'm Eva Ketesdi, Frontend Developer

I'm all about turning wild ideas into snazzy, user-friendly websites. When I'm not glued to my screen, you can catch me geeking out over the latest design trends or learning funky new coding tricks. And of course, no day is complete without a cup of good ol' coffee. Let's team up and create some web magic together. Cheers to making the internet a cooler place!
